code: import React from'react';import{Slide}from"react-awesome-reveal";import icon1 from'../../../images/icon/user-icon.png';import icon2 from'../../../images/icon/music-play.png';import icon3 from'../../../images/icon/dollar-circle.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Features=[{title:'Expert team members',des:'We take pride in assembling a diverse and highly skilled.',icon:icon1,duration:1000},{title:'Fastest customer service',des:'We pride ourselves on providing the fastest customer service industry.',icon:icon2,duration:1200},{title:'Reasonable pricing',des:'We believe in providing reasonable pricing that offers exceptional.',icon:icon3,duration:1400}];var FeatureSection=function FeatureSection(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"feature  pt-110 pb-130",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"feature-wrap",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row mt-none-30",children:Features.map(function(features,fitem){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-lg-4 col-md-12 mt-30",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slide,{direction:"left",triggerOnce:'false',duration:features.duration,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feature-item ul_li",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"xb-item--icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:features.icon,alt:""})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"xb-item--holder",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"xb-item--title",children:features.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"xb-item--content",children:features.des})]})]})})})},fitem);})})})})});};export default FeatureSection;
